translations: n.（复数）爪子；〈美口〉同“papa”；〈谑〉(人的)手；〈俚〉笔迹

sentences.sentence: The cat sat licking its paws.
The kitten was black with white front paws and a white splotch on her chest.
sentences.translation: 那只小猫除了白色前爪和胸部的一块白色区域外是黑色的。

sentences.sentence: Now Toad was very proud of his paws.
sentences.translation: 托德对他的爪子非常自豪。
